author: snoopdave
msg: Merging more Planet work and other changes from trunk
Also, changed Roller-Weblogger UI to use new Planet data model:
- Roller UI assumes one default Planet object exists
- Database creation/migration scripts create that default Planet
- Roller UI updated to use Planet PropertiesManager for configuration
- Struts2 jars now included in build
- Struts2 filter now included and mapped

author: danj
msg: Minor cleanup and consistency fixes. I also added JavaDoc links to the sample code in part 8 of the tutorial.

author: jim
msg: Further clarification on how the ASF will accept the
grants. Of course, snail-mailed and FAXed copies are OK.
Also note the scanned-Email method. Further clarify
that in all cases, a copy must be provided to the
ASF secretary if sent directly to someone else and
